sentences.sContent: Fringe benefits here include a cigar club, the fastest lifts in the world, and the chance to snap peregrine falcons as they migrate past your no doubt hermetically sealed expanse of window.
sentences.sContent_eng: Fringe benefits here include a cigar club, the fastest lifts in the world, and the chance to snap peregrine falcons as they migrate past your no doubt hermetically sealed expanse of window.
sentences.sCn: 这里的额外好处包括了一个雪茄俱乐部，世界上最快速的电梯，以及当游隼迁徙飞过你的绝对密封的巨大玻璃窗户时，抓住它们的机会。

trans.tranCn: 游隼 a外来的,移住的
